about_the_game:
DLC Contents

The DLC Expansion includes 5 bonus scenarios, as well as a full length illustration booklet in both English and Japanese!

DLC Bonus Stories

- A Ghostly Adventure

- Kaoru's New Outlook
- Mew ≒ Ryuusei?!
- A Cat's Tale
- Happy x Happy Wedding
Base game is required to play the DLC bonus stories.

Illustration Booklets

PDF Booklets Include character art, illustrations, comics, and short stories!

[English booklet contains translated comics and side stories]

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a work of fiction. It features sexual content in the form of sexual innuendo, revealing outfits, implied sexual encounters, and discussion of sexual themes. Events in the game contain usage of crude language, legal consumption of alcohol, and mild fantasy/cartoon violence.
